interactions.description: Increased risk of bleeding when anticoagulants are combined with antiplatelet agents
interactions.recommendation: Use combination only if benefit outweighs risk. Monitor INR closely and watch for signs of bleeding.

interactions.description: ACE inhibitors can increase potassium levels, combining with potassium supplements may cause hyperkalemia
interactions.recommendation: Monitor serum potassium levels regularly. Consider reducing potassium supplementation.

interactions.description: Clarithromycin increases Atorvastatin levels, increasing risk of myopathy/rhabdomyolysis
interactions.recommendation: Avoid combination or use alternative antibiotic. If necessary, hold statin during antibiotic course.

interactions.description: NSAIDs may reduce the antihypertensive effect of ACE inhibitors and increase risk of renal impairment
interactions.recommendation: Monitor blood pressure and renal function. Use lowest effective dose of NSAID for shortest duration.
